brand.description: Premium streetwear for the modern lifestyle. Quality craftsmanship meets contemporary design.

home.latest.title: Latest Arrivals
home.latest.subtitle: Discover our newest arrivals, crafted with attention to detail and designed for everyday comfort.
home.categories.title: Shop by Category
home.categories.subtitle: Find exactly what you're looking for
home.about.title: About Busy
home.about.p1: Busy was born in Mar del Plata, with the idea of staying focused on what’s important. Two friends produced a batch of basics — t-shirts and hoodies — and realized they didn’t have to be boxed in, deciding to expand the brand.
home.about.p2: The team grew, and so did the vision. Today we are resellers, we run our own podcast, and we organize events, aiming to create a creative ecosystem that brings together streetwear, exclusive branding, and a strong concept.
home.about.p3: We want to build a community that expresses itself through what it wears and how it lives. Because Busy means focusing on what’s truly worth it.
home.social.title: Trusted by Thousands
home.social.subtitle: Join our community of style enthusiasts
home.cta.title: Ready to Elevate Your Style?
home.cta.subtitle: Discover premium streetwear that combines comfort, quality, and contemporary design. Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust Busy for their everyday style.

about.hero.title: About Us
about.hero.subtitle: We're more than just a clothing brand. We're a community of individuals who believe that great style should be accessible, comfortable, and authentic to who you are.
about.story.title: Our Story
about.story.p1: Busy was born from a simple observation: the modern individual is always on the move, juggling multiple responsibilities while trying to maintain their personal style. We saw a gap in the market for clothing that could keep up with this lifestyle.
about.story.p2: Our founders, passionate about both fashion and functionality, set out to create pieces that would seamlessly transition from work to weekend, from casual to elevated. Every design decision is made with the busy individual in mind.
about.story.p3: Today, Busy represents more than just clothing—it's a mindset. It's about being productive, purposeful, and stylish, no matter what your day brings.
about.values.title: Our Values
about.values.subtitle: These core principles guide everything we do, from design to customer service.
about.timeline.title: Our Journey
about.timeline.subtitle: From a small idea to a growing community of style enthusiasts.
about.cta.title: Join the Busy Community
about.cta.subtitle: Be part of a community that values quality, style, and authenticity. Follow us on social media and stay updated with our latest collections and stories.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.desc: We never compromise on quality. Every piece is crafted with premium materials and attention to detail.

community.title: Community Driven
community.desc: Our designs are inspired by and created for our community of style enthusiasts worldwide.

sustainable.title: Sustainable
sustainable.desc: We're committed to sustainable practices and ethical manufacturing processes.

passion.title: Passion
passion.desc: Fashion is our passion, and we pour our heart into every design and customer interaction.

2020.title: The Beginning
2020.desc: Founded with a vision to create premium streetwear that doesn't compromise on comfort or style.

2021.title: First Collection
2021.desc: Launched our signature hoodie line, quickly gaining recognition for quality and design.

2022.title: Community Growth
2022.desc: Reached 10,000+ satisfied customers and expanded our product range.

2023.title: Sustainability Focus
2023.desc: Implemented eco-friendly practices and sustainable material sourcing.

2024.title: Global Expansion
2024.desc: Expanded shipping worldwide and opened our first flagship store.
